import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Row, Col, Card, Avatar, Tabs, Form, Icon, Input, Button, Checkbox } from "antd"; import { WrappedAccountForm } from "../components/Form"; import { PageLayout } from "../Layout/PageLayout"; const { TabPane } = Tabs; class AccountSetting extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { User_Name:'', User_Email:'', Account_type:'' } } componentWillMount() { const profile_data = JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem("session_data")); this.setState({User_Name:profile_data['first_name'] + " " + profile_data['last_name']}); this.setState({User_Email:profile_data['email']}); } render() { const formItemLayout = { labelCol: { xs: { span: 24 }, sm: { span: 8 }, }, wrapperCol: { xs: { span: 24 }, sm: { span: 16 }, }, }; const tailFormItemLayout = { wrapperCol: { xs: { span: 24, offset: 0, }, sm: { span: 16, offset: 8, }, }, }; const { getFieldDecorator } = this.props.form; const profile_data = JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem("session_data")); const data = this.props.location.data; return (

); } } const WrappedAccountSetting = Form.create()(AccountSetting); export default WrappedAccountSetting;
